about_the_game:
The map of the Eastern half of the USA and parts of Canada - build tracks from port cities - new rules!

Detailed Rules of Map:
  • 🌇 There have been added black goods and cities.
  • 🏙️ Densely arranged cities and towns often occupy adjacent hexes. You can connect adjacent cities with a new token (cost $3).
  • 🛤️ You can start building rails from the cities marked as harbors. This forces strong interaction from the 1st round! You can also build from the cities with tracks later.
  • ⛰️ There are two kinds of mountains on the map. Hills cost +$2 and high mountains cost +$3.
